channel.title: My dragonscape compiler is not working
channel.description: it says that i need java JDK 5.0 or 6.0. i got jdk 1.6.0_1. is this the right one, or do i need a different one? and if i do, can someone give me a link to a new one, or a different code for the compiler?

item.title: My dragonscape compiler is not working
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Use Mod Tahorok’s, it’s eays to use and not confusing

item.source: My dragonscape compiler is not working

item.title: My dragonscape compiler is not working
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“mage_owner, post:4, topic:95305”]just use Mod Taharok’s Perfect Compiler v 1.9

here is the link…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html[/quote]

You don’t really need perfect compiler 1.9.

Simple - delete all the stuff in compiler and add:

echo off title Java Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: My dragonscape compiler is not working
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

I have a old compiler that i used to use one sec let me see if i can find it…

echo off title Java Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

you can also search for mod thoroks compiler which is supposed to be the best:P

Read full topic
